channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken street sign at the top of Bloomsbury Street, Cheltenham, 5th September
item.description:
The street sign at the top of Bloomsbury Street has been broken for a couple of weeks and it's now lying in the ditch behind the posts, as seen in the pictures attached

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46a, Bloomsbury Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked Street Drains, 5th September
item.description:
With the recent heavy rains, it was apparent that there are blocked street drains at the intersection of Trafalgar Street, Cheltenham with Oriel Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Wolseley Terrace, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large tree growing on verge outside of 45 Courtiers Drive, 5th September
item.description:
Tree growing close and touching residence. Resident is requesting maintenance works to be carried out. Initial report sent in was sent to Tewkesbury Borough Council but TBC does not own/maintain this patch.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-3, Minetts Avenue, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General road markings, lines and stud issues problem, 5th September
item.description:
FMS request: 'Can you let me know if there is any chance of repainting the faded double yellows'
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Street light is permanently out problem, 5th September
item.description:
Customer reports that all of the streetlights are out at the location - they have been for months. They were fixed, but have gone out again. They feel unable to go out at night as a consequence.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 5th September
item.description:

item.title: The disabled wording outside Hartley Court in Pittville Circus Road is badly scuffed and is very difficult to read. It needs repainting, 5th September

item.title: Estate sign attached to actual street sign, 5th September
item.description:
A De Mel estate agent sign has been attached directly to the street sign for Cedar Court Rd. There is also, next to it, a 'Move' estate agent sign which may/may not be sited on public property/the verge, rather than on the actual property itself which is being advertised.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Walk, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
